subscription_end_note: Your [PLAN_DURATION] [PLAN_DURATION_UNIT] plan [PLAN_NAME] will end on [EXPIRY_DATE]. Apply to upgrade your subscription.
subscription_ended_note: Your [PLAN_DURATION] [PLAN_DURATION_UNIT] plan [PLAN_NAME] ended on [EXPIRY_DATE]. Apply to upgrade your subscription.
subscription_transaction_limit_ended: You have crossed the transactions limit of your assigned plan [PLAN_NAME] subscribed on [PLAN_START_DATE]. To continue your accounting with Giddh, Please renew your current plan or switch to another one. Contact us for more assistance.
continue_giddh_note: To continue your accounting with Giddh, Please renew your current plan or switch to another one. Contact us for more assistance.
plan_expired_note: Your [PLAN_DURATION] [PLAN_DURATION_UNIT](s) FREE [PLAN_NAME] ended on [EXPIRY_DATE]. We hope you enjoyed using Giddh Accounting Software as much as we loved building it for you. To continue your subscription buy any plan or contact us for more assistance.
transaction_limit_crossed: You have crossed the transactions limit of your assigned plan [PLAN_NAME] subscribed on [PLAN_START_DATE].
cash_information: Generate instant paid voucher without managing separate account/ledger.
credit_information: Generate invoice and manage accounts/ledger separately.
go_to_branch_information: To access other create options go to branch mode
depreciation_message: This version of Giddh is deprecated, please contact
depreciation_data_message: to migrate your data to the latest version before 31st March, 2024.
